Sequence Information.Peptide Name: SS-I (S. salamandra I; defensins; 3S=S, UCSS1a; natural AMPs; salamanders, amphibians, animals)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is most similar (75%) toCFBD-1C: 14%.Activity: inhibited SARS-CoV-2 (EC50 2.7 uM). GRAVY: 0.3386; mol Wt: 4869.681; mol formula: C215H318N55O60S7; mol ex coeff: 11885.Toxicity: Vero CCL-81 cells (LC50 10 uM). Little hemolysis till 100 uM.
Literature Information.Author: Barros ALAN, Silva VC, Ribeiro-Junior AF, Cardoso MG, Costa SR, Moraes CB, Barbosa CG, Coleone AP, Simões RP, Cabral WF, Falcão RM, Vasconcelos AG, Rocha JA, Arcanjo DDR, Batagin-Neto A, Borges TKS, Gonçalves J, Brand GD, Freitas-Junior LHG, Eaton P, Marani M, Kato MJ, Plácido A, Leite JRSA.2024
Literature Information.Title: Antiviral Action against SARS-CoV-2 of a Synthetic Peptide Based on a Novel Defensin Present in the Transcriptome of the Fire Salamander (Salamandra salamandra).
